AN_Model

The ‘M’ in MVC.

Summary
AN_ModelThe ‘M’ in MVC.
Functions
defineModelDefines a model at runtime allowing for models to be used without the need to create a class for each one.

Functions

defineModel

static function defineModel($name,  
$parent =  'AN_Model')

Defines a model at runtime allowing for models to be used without the need to create a class for each one.

@param string $name Name for the new model.  @param string $parent The class the model should inherit from.  (Default: AN_Model) @static @access public

static function defineModel($name,  
$parent =  'AN_Model')
Defines a model at runtime allowing for models to be used without the need to create a class for each one.
